description:
Bums, Tums & Thighs is a class that does exactly what it says on the tin, a popular workout for women as it works your thighs, glutes and abs. This workout is the most-effective session for better-looking legs, firmer bum and a tighter tum. The Bums, Tums & Thighs class is a workout which consists of a series of exercises that specifically targets these areas. By targeting these areas one after the other you’re tackling all three key problem areas in one fun-packed but very effective class.

What this class is great for:
This class is the ultimate toning session for your lower body. Helping you to tone up & firm up your stomach, hips, thighs and bottom with a high-intensity workout. Come try out this brilliant workout for yourself and sign up to a class at one of the local Better Leisure Centres where you could see a significant improvement in your fitness levels. With a variety of different classes running throughout the week you can find a class that works around your schedule.

Who can take part:
This specific no-nonsense workout may seem a bit excessive, but our expert trainers know exactly what they’re doing and can help anyone at different fitness levels.

Difficulty Level:
Beginner - Intermediate

Other facilities:
Changing and shower facilities are available for use before and after the class.
You are recommended to use lockers that are available for any belongings. Lockers generally take 20p or a £1.00 coin although we do not take any responsibility for the valuables left in them.

Other classes you might be interested in:
20/20/20
Body Conditioning
Power Pump

A Power Pump class is really beneficial to those starting out in the world of fitness as it’s where attendees will learn the right techniques for the basic moves associated with lifting barbells and plates. Not only can it accommodate beginners it is also challenging for experienced gym goers. A Power Pump session includes a skilled instructor teaching an entire class proper lifting methods using barbells and plates incorporating sets & reps for each muscle group being worked accompanied by high energy motivating music that will really get your heart ‘pumping’! The class provides a fun and upbeat environment to exercise in.

What this class is great for:
This class is designed to firm, tone, strengthen and define all the muscles in your body. This full-body workout can help you burn calories, decreases body fat and all the while targeting multiple muscle groups at once. Find the next Power Pump class at your local Better Leisure Centre where you could enjoy a challenging new workout.

Who can take part:
The great thing about a Power Pump class is that instructors can accommodate all fitness levels, so it really doesn’t matter if you’re a beginner or a seasoned exerciser - everyone can work out together. Power Pump classes draw a crowd of young and old, male & female, making it an ideal fitness class for all.

Difficulty Level:
Beginner - Intermediate

Other facilities:
Changing and shower facilities are available for use before and after the class.
You are recommended to use lockers that are available for any belongings. Lockers generally take 20p or a £1.00 coin although we do not take any responsibility for the valuables left in them.

Other classes you might be interested in:
BTT
Kinesis
20/20/20
Vinsyasa Yoga, a modern-day form of classical Indian yoga.

Step and Sculpt is like Step Aerobics, but includes strength training intervals to give you a complete cardio and weights workout.

What this class is great for:
You can ensure to receive all the same great benefits as a regular step class, but with the combined sculpting session it can seriously improve your strength, body toning and coordination, all the while giving you a serious head-to-toe cardio workout whilst burning away those pesky calories. So step and sculpt away at a Better Leisure Centre where you could see a huge improvement in your body image in no time.

Who can take part:
The great thing about this class is that each instructor takes different fitness levels into consideration and can work with people of all levels. So it really doesn’t matter whether you’ve never done a step class before or you’re stepping away every week.

Difficulty Level:
Beginner - Advanced

Other facilities:
Changing and shower facilities are available for use before and after the class.
You are recommended to use lockers that are available for any belongings. Lockers generally take 20p or a £1.00 coin although we do not take any responsibility for the valuables left in them.

Other classes you might be interested in:
Step Aerobics
Step & Pump
Body Conditioning

A low impact, high intensity class using a step platform for a great workout.

Its a good old favourite!

Body Conditioning
Power Pump

It’s a whole body workout that can improve your overall fitness, which also makes it one of our most versatile classes. Body Conditioning classes at Better can help you on your way to get in great shape and feel great about your body. Focusing on strength, muscular endurance and fitness conditioning, these classes will help to develop a strong and toned physique.
Body conditioning classes involve a high energy, high impact workout, which typically involves a combination of aerobics and toning. This mixed all-around workout is for all parts of your body giving you a high-intensity workout that hits the parts that other classes miss. It can be great fun but it's always a lot of hard work so commitment levels must be high as must your motivation.

What this class is great for:
The high-energy head-to-toe workout is a high mixed impact session combining a mixture of aerobics with toning and cardio all rolled into one class. A Body Conditioning class can deliver all-round benefits to every part of your body. This all-inclusive class can help you become more toned and physically fitter.
So sign up to a body conditioning class today at your local Better Leisure Centre where you can kick-start your fitness journey.

Who can take part:
Despite being quite an intense workout that requires a reasonable amount of motivation, our instructors will be able to adapt the class to suit different fitness levels.

Difficulty Level:
Beginner - Advanced

Other facilities:
Changing and shower facilities are available for use before and after the class.
You are recommended to use lockers that are available for any belongings. Lockers generally take 20p or a £1.00 coin although we do not take any responsibilities for the valuables left in them.

Other classes you might be interested in:
BTT
Power Pump
20/20/20

An all-over body workout incorporating different stations with resistance and cardiovascular exercises. Suitable for all fitness levels. Exercises can be made easier or harder with very simple changes that your instructor will guide you through.

Group Cycle is indoor cycling as its best. This high-energy cycling class allows you to cycle with other gym goers and is a great way to get in a vigorous and effective workout. A typical group cycle class lasts for roughly about 30-45 minutes and consists of an instructor guiding you through different cycle routines on an indoor bike. The great thing is that you can work at your own pace in this entertaining class.

What this class is great for:
Group cycling strengthens the heart and lungs whilst increasing lower body muscular strength and endurance. This short, but high intensity, high energy workout can help burn a huge amount of calories in a short amount of time and help keep your muscles toned. Cycle your way to a fitter and healthier lifestyle with a Group Cycle class today at a Better Leisure Centre. With a huge variety of different class times you can easily find a class that suits and works around you.

Who can take part:
Group Cycle offers a variety of different classes available and a range of classes for all fitness levels anyone and everyone can join from absolute beginners to advanced cyclists.

Difficulty Level:
Beginner - Advanced

Other facilities:
Changing and shower facilities are available for use before and after the class.
You are recommended to use lockers that are available for any belongings. Lockers generally take 20p or a £1.00 coin although we do not take any responsibility for the valuables left in them.

Other classes you might be interested in:
Group Cycle & Sculpt
Body Conditioning

Functional Circuits blends together the best of both worlds, giving your traditional circuit training class a slight twist. This class incorporates new and exciting ideas, what makes Functional Circuits different is that the exercises resemble activities you do every day. The class involves 5 main functional movements: push, pull, rotate, squat and lunge.

What this class is great for:
A circuit class that will challenge your body in ways you could never imagine. After a Functional Circuits class you can be sure to feel energised and enjoy a good cardio workout session. What’s more by doing Functional Circuits you can start to develop a lean and toned body whilst targeting core muscle groups such as abs, glutes arms and thighs. Giving you a full-body workout that will improve your fitness levels.

Who can take part:
Functional Circuits is a great class for all as there are instructors who adapt to all fitness levels and it’s mainly suitable for those 16-55 years of age.

Difficulty Level:
Beginner - Advanced

Other facilities:
Changing and shower facilities are available for use before and after the class.
You are recommended to use lockers that are available for any belongings. Lockers generally take 20p or a £1.00 coin although we do not take any responsibility for the valuables left in them.

Other classes you might be interested in:
Circuits
Boxfit
Outdoor Bootcamp
A multi-functional training station for all abilities that compliments and enhances any training programme – the Xcube provides a safe, fun and effective training environment.
A multi-functional training station for all abilities that compliments and enhances any training programme – the Xcube provides a safe, fun and effective training environment.

Dance yourselves fit and let the upbeat Latin-inspired aerobic rhythms control your body and jump on board the fiesta dance workout that has been around for many years. Brazilian Dance is a dynamic dance fitness sensation that combines Latin and International music that involves using your legs and hips to move your body. Making it the most fun and effective workout system, ever!

What this class is great for:
This fun and unique way to lose weight involves dance and aerobic elements. Brazilian dance choreography is a fusion of different variety of dances such as Salsa, Samba, Merengue, Mambo, Reggaeton and aerobics. The dance moves incorporate fitness with squats and lunges, making this class perfect for toning up, increasing energy levels and burning fat. The high-energy style, blended upbeat world rhythms dances with easy-to-follow choreography, is a total-body workout that can burn high calories per hour but, miraculously, people seem to really enjoy it.Brazilian Dance classes features exotic rhythms set to high-energy Latin and international beats. Before you know it, you'll be getting fit and your energy levels will be soaring!

Who can take part:
Brazilian Dance is inclusive and easy-to-do, it doesn’t matter if you can dance or not. Both men and women can take part and anyone over the age 16 can join in on the fun. And the best thing is that it’s effective and totally exhilarating.
With classes and instructors available at a range of gyms across the Better branches anyone can join in on the party, so ditch the boring workout and dance yourselves fit and get those hips moving!

Difficulty Level:
Beginner - Intermediate

Other facilities:
Changing and shower facilities are available for use before and after the class.
You are recommended to use lockers that are available for any belongings. Lockers generally take 20p or a £1.00 coin although we do not take any responsibility for the valuables left in them.

Other classes you might be interested in:
Aerobics
R&B Dance
Soca Aerobics

Judo is one of the most popular martial arts which improves physical fitness, balance, flexibility, coordination and posture.? These sessions have a highly-motivating and rewarding non-competitive grading scheme so ideal for beginners and graded students of the sport.

Pilates is a functional way of raising your activity levels, especially if you’d like to improve your mobility or are recovering from an injury. Pilates can be adapted to raise the fitness levels of someone less active, and it can challenge someone very fit. Making it open to both men and women alike and whatever your fitness level, Pilates can accommodate you.

What this class is great for:
Pilates strengthens the core and can bring many health benefits such as helping with back pain, improving body alignment, posture, flexibility and much more. It is an exercise system that focuses on stretching and strengthening the whole body improving your body’s balance and muscle strength. With a variety of Pilates classes constantly running at one of the Better Leisure Centres you can easily sign up to a Pilates class and reap the benefits today.

Who can take part:
Pilates is suitable for people of all levels of fitness. You’re never too late to start; Pilates can be devised into a programme of exercises tailored to your fitness levels.

Difficulty Level:
Beginner - Advanced

Other facilities:
Changing and shower facilities are available for use before and after the class.
You are recommended to use lockers that are available for any belongings. Lockers generally take 20p or a £1.00 coin although we do not take any responsibility for the valuables left in them.

Other classes you might be interested in:
Core Stability
Yoga - Hatha
Ab Blast

These dedicated session allow 11 to 15 year olds to use the gym in a supervised session.

Enjoy working out to the latest tunes whilst working out with your friends. After your induction which is carried out on your first visit, Fitness Instructors are on hand to write specific training programmes and give you ongoing advice.
